reasons: Air pollution occurs when harmful or excessive quantities of substances are introduced into Earth's atmosphere. Air pollution can have different causes. On one side there are natural causes like natural disasters. On the other side there are man-made causes of air pollution like traffic or industrial processes.
consequences: The consequences of air pollution are diverse. The environment is encumbered with consequences like climate change. Human beings are mainly encumbered with respiratory disease.
navbarHelp: To switch between the diffrent observed-properties click on on of them in the menu. More detailed functions can be selected in the 'More Functions' menu. To view detailed sensor-information click on a sensor, a colored circle, on the map. To see interpolated data select the interpolation overlay and click on a point on the map.
